p: All solvents and chemical compounds were purchased from Sigma Aldrich. Commercial organic solvents, hexane, chloroform, ethyl acetate, and acetone were of analytical grade (∼99.5%). Chemical compounds (Silica gel, DPPH radical, β-carotene) used were of high purity. The phytochemical screenings used were TLC, Liebermann–Burchard, Mayer reagent, Dragendorff, and Folin–Ciocâlteu.
